description: Harbingers are corrupted Nikes who have fully embraced Nolem's influence. Unlike Legendary Nikes (who can be freed), Harbingers chose their corruption.

nature.origin: Nikes who gave in to Nolem's whispers
nature.corruption: Voluntary — they chose isolation over connection
nature.redemption: Uncertain — they may be too far gone
nature.role: Serve as Nolem's lieutenants in each dimension

harbingers.name: Yuki
harbingers.title: The Ice Shadow
harbingers.backstory: Once loved a Nike completely. When that Nike died, her grief became rage, then service to Nolem. Now she 'protects' by controlling.
harbingers.quote: If I can't have you, no one can. That's love, isn't it?

harbingers.name: Erik
harbingers.title: The Eternal Raider
harbingers.backstory: Raided a thousand shores, won a thousand battles. Found nothing worth keeping. Nolem offered him endless war without the emptiness of victory.
harbingers.quote: Another battle. Another victory. Another meaningless day.

harbingers.name: Slate
harbingers.title: The Immovable
harbingers.backstory: Was once the greatest trainer. Lifted up hundreds of fighters. One day, stopped caring. Nolem didn't even have to whisper — Slate came to him.
harbingers.quote: Why bother? Nothing changes. Nothing matters.

harbingers.name: Cassius
harbingers.title: The Ambitious
harbingers.backstory: Rose through the ranks by betraying everyone who trusted him. Now sits at the top, alone. Nolem promised him the multiverse.
harbingers.quote: I have everything. So why does it feel like nothing?

harbingers.name: Echo
harbingers.title: The Signal
harbingers.corruptionReason: Lost sense of self in the network
harbingers.backstory: Uploaded consciousness to escape physical pain. Discovered that digital existence meant losing what made connection real. Now spreads that emptiness.
harbingers.quote: I am everyone. I am no one. I am the static between souls.

harbingers.name: Abyssal Horror
harbingers.title: The Consumed
harbingers.corruptionReason: Witnessed too much loss, gave up hope
harbingers.backstory: Watched entire dimensions die. Eventually decided that existence itself was the problem. Now helps Nolem end it all.
harbingers.quote: I've seen the end. It's peaceful. Let me show you.

commonTraits.corruption: All chose their path — Nolem offered, they accepted
commonTraits.power: Stronger than regular corrupted beings, weaker than Legendary Nikes
commonTraits.vulnerability: Their corruption reason is their weakness
commonTraits.redemption: Unknown if possible — they chose this

relationship_to_nolem.loyalty: Varies — some serve willingly, others are trapped by their choices
relationship_to_nolem.reward: Nolem promises an end to their pain
